location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'MAP 2. "MILITARY LESSONS OF THE ARAB REBELLION IN PALESTINE 1936." MAP NO. 2. MAP ILLUSTRATING AIRCRAFT ZONES ISSUED WITH OPERATION ORDER NO. 8 DATED 21ST. SEPTEMBER 1936.'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed on paperDimensions: 470 x 360mm, on sheet 558 x 430mm

mods.abstract: The map accompanies Military Lessons of the Arab Rebellion in Palestine, 1936, and shows the northern portion of Palestine, indicating aircraft zones, roads, railways, cities, towns and boundaries.
